name: Whackabirthdaymole
description:
It's simple, you're a birthday mole and you throw a cake at other moles. Miss 5 times and it's over, hit a lot and... I'll add some congratulatory text in the future maybe.

Created for a low effort jam by me (a Unity dev) and my friend (an artist, you can find her in telegram at @al_veresk). I am actually kind of unsure how low effor this is but trust me, for me it is low effort! Please trust me... I have chronic fatigue so I don't know how much work is normal. But I have been unable to create anything complete for so long (not that this is too complete but u know)

Soundtrack by me, I'll add an option to mute it later cause it's very annoying

Also port to android is coming I guess? It's all just unprofessional fun though so idk
